name: Google Plus Favicon
author: Patrick Chia

sections.description: This plugin allows you to generate a Google+ favicon for your blog and admin logo included Apple touch icon. Activate the plugin, and it will add G+ photo to your blog template and admin panel automatically.
sections.installation:
Support WordPress and WordPress Multisite

Standard Multisite Plugins installation.

  1. Upload google-plus-favicon.php to the /wp-content/mu-plugins/ directory

Standard Plugins installation.

  1. Upload google-plus-favicon.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.

  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress

  3. Enter G+ account ID in General Settings
sections.faq:
Where can I get support and question about this plugin?

Please feel free visit my blog at Patrick or +me and leave your comment.

How do I disable the Google Plus favicon?

You can disabled the web site icon option in General Settings. Then the favicon will turn off.

short_description: Simply add a Google+ account ID to generate a G+ favicon for your blog and admin logo included Apple touch icon.
description: This plugin allows you to generate a Google+ favicon for your blog and admin logo included Apple touch icon. Activate the plugin, and it will add G+ photo to your blog template and admin panel automatically.

screenshots.caption: Web site icon in Admin Panel, Site and Address bar.
